basic.description:
Continuation of MUSC 185/3.0. Students study orchestral stringed instruments through class instruction on selected instruments. Emphasis includes further study of playing techniques, ranges, fingerings, bowings, transpositions, tunings, instrument maintenance, ensemble repertoire and teaching techniques. Rental instruments available.
NOTE    Enrolment is limited to students in a MUSC Plan or the B.Mus. Program.
LEARNING HOURS    114 (36L;78P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: String Techniques and Methods II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     MUSC185 or permission of the instructor.
